basics.name: Rémi Staelen
basics.label: Data Engineer & Data Scientist
basics.summary: Master's student in Data Management in Biosciences, holding a Master's degree in Data/AI, with three years of work-study experience and two internships in the field. Strong interest in data analysis applied to biology and eager to evolve in environments where these skills create real value.

objective.title: Looking for Internship
objective.role: Data Analyst / Data Engineer / Data Scientist in Health
objective.note: Possibility of work-study for the second year starting September 2026

education.description: Bioinformatics, biostatistics, molecular and cellular biology

education.area: HND in Software Solutions and Business Applications

highlights: Implementation of a Data Lakehouse architecture (Bronze/Silver/Gold) on Microsoft Fabric
End-to-end development of an AI model for predicting appliance breakdowns (XGBoost)
Industrialization and deployment of the model via an API on Azure Machine Learning with CI/CD pipeline
Creation of strategic dashboard (KPIs) on Power BI
Automation of quarterly tonnage exports and reports enabling financial support recovery from an eco-organization
Audit and cleaning of large datasets (Big Data After-Sales Service) for predictive model training
Design and deployment of a Serverless Cloud architecture on AWS (Lambda, S3) for social trend monitoring
Development of automated data ingestion pipelines and structuring into a queryable Data Lake via Amazon Athena
Integration of AWS AI services for semantic and visual analysis of viral content
Development of a Front-End web application in ReactJS for trend restitution and filtering
Implementation of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) via Terraform to automate Cloud resource deployment
Creation of decision-making dashboards on Amazon QuickSight for tracking virality KPIs
Fullstack development of an HRIS candidate tracking module on React.js and Symfony
Design of a dynamic recruitment process management interface (Progress bars, state management)
Implementation of interactive forms linked to a PostgreSQL database via API Platform
AI R&D: Creation of a CV parsing model (NLP) with Python and spaCy for automatic skill extraction
Collaborative project management with Git and Trello
Design and development of a secure authentication module (Login/Register) in native PHP coupled with a MySQL database
Application security: implementation of password hashing and protection against SQL injections and XSS vulnerabilities
Refactoring and code optimization (Clean Code) by separating business logic and display to facilitate maintenance
Implementation of development best practices: versioning with Git/GitHub and respect for the DRY principle
Integration of third-party APIs (SMS/Microsoft) and initiation to Cloud services (AWS) and Symfony framework

items: Relational Database Modeling and Management (Lambda, Kappa)
AWS (Lambda, S3, Athena, QuickSight, SageMaker, EC2)
Azure (Azure Machine Learning, Azure Foundry, Blob Storage)
Microsoft Fabric (Data Factory, Dataflow, Warehouse, Lakehouse)
